992150.name: Amaze VR - Thriller Pack 1
992150.description:
January 2019 Amaze VR Interactive Movie DLC Pack


DLC Pack includes two thrillers 180° 3D VR Movies at a discounted price.

• Redway Manor (112 min): James North has been murdered. As Jennifer Adams, decide who you can trust in order to find the culprit or you'll be the next victim.

• The Willows (158 min): The creators of CreepLA present The Willows, an immersive theater experience about the sinister secrets of a family. Experience this exclusive and sold-out show in LA anywhere in the world through Amaze VR.

Enjoy “Choose Your Own Adventure” experiences where you decide the course of the story!
992150.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
